sourceMeaningMnemonic: Put a <radical>hole</radical> in someone's <radical>body</radical> with a <radical>bow</radical> and they'll become <kanji>destitute</kanji>. You put a hole in them. They can't work. They can't take care of their house or their kids. They've lost it all.
meaningInfo: Picture a destitute person wandering in the streets with a hole in their body.
readingMnemonic: You see this <kanji>destitute</kanji> person and decide to give them a <reading>cu</reading>cumber (<ja>きゅう</ja>). They don't even remember that they're supposed to eat those, so they shove it in the hole you made with your bow.
readingInfo: Picture a destitute person, sitting on the street, holding a cucumber. Putting the cucumber in their hole. Crying.
